item.title: Green
item.description: Well, how about today. It’s a nice blue green day today and I’m actally trying to be outside. Had a cup of tea this morning. Rather enjoying this. As for projects, I think I am going to work on my ferrissay cli app today. It’s mainly a jumble of cargo crates, but it’s interesting learning it. I’ll post more about it when it’s more ready. Currently it only greets people, I would like it to be more like cowsay when it’s done.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I seem to have misplaced the old blog, so here’s a new one. What’s new with Eric? Well, I’m learning rust, been playing with Kotlin a little. Personally, I’ve been feeling a little better I think. There’s always the eb and flow to all of it. I look forward to seeing how things go. On the radio front, I continue to run my packet bbs station, and have been messaging people with that.
